subject: NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
Basketball (College)
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Mike George, who won $144,000 on “Deal or No Deal,” put half into a youth team whose alumni include Syracuse’s Tyler Ennis among nine players in this year’s N.C.A.A. tournament.
snippet: Mike George, who won $144,000 on “Deal or No Deal,” put half into a youth team whose alumni include Syracuse’s Tyler Ennis among nine players in this year’s N.C.A.A. tournament.
